[[/tab]]
[[tab THE TOYMAKER]]

[[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/15b69460-bc27-4870-8f3b-689c3929784a/ddq42fo-ca34ede9-3131-444e-a15f-6a37279651be.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..zhUGRBz9knCXzDu4dyPBNghibhfzJwQ8A7dmS20l3BM]]
Howdy.
As for a bit about me I am the local weirdo who makes art almost exclusively on MSpaint because other programs are too hard and too expensive. I am notoriously very bad at writing so I mostly give back to the community in the form of fanart. Ive been a fan since I was in middle school, its the least I can do. If you want to support me please consider following me on tumblr 

https://labradoritefractiles.tumblr.com/ 

[[/tab]]
[[tab The Toymaker's Request Box]]
Dead for the time being : (
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
author: TheCynicalToymaker
